analysis.description: StandardToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/29/0x3c1b1abf64a441bc106e055cdc89ba4ca005993e.sol#146-158) is declared view but contains assembly code

	- balances (/unique_chucks/29/0x3c1b1abf64a441bc106e055cdc89ba4ca005993e.sol#143)
